title: Title
school_rules_validation: Validation of school rules on the portal needed.
app_description:
LeoPortail is an app whose goal is to make the use of the student portal of the pole Leonard the Vinci easier.
 ## Thanks : 
 - Robin Bouchet 
 - Antoine Tête (dev)
 - MorningStar (dev & translation)
 Erwan Regnault (translation)
gdpr_consent: LeoPortail needs your consent to process your personal data for :
notif_more: Personal information such as the unique identifier of your device and a digital fingerprint of your classes of the day (hash) will be sent and processed by our server. Deleted after a maximum of 12 hours
crash_more: Personal information such as the unique identifier, technical specifications of your device and error report will be sent to and processed by Sentry, a privacy-friendly error tracking service. Under no circumstances will this data be transferred or sold to third parties.
analytics_more: Personal information such as the unique identifier, the technical characteristics of your device and your application usage habits will be sent to and processed by our server (Matomo). Under no circumstances will this data be transferred or sold to third parties.
gdpr_footer: These settings can be changed at any time from the application settings.
error_playerid: Notifications must be enabled to access the playerId
showcase_add: Add an event to the schedule
showcase_today:
Allows you to go back
to today in the schedule
showcase_more_menu:
3 sub-menus:
- Day/Week (changes the shape of the calendar),
- Refresh (refreshes the schedule),
- Free rooms (shows the free rooms in the school)
showcase_add_calendar: Clicking on an empty space in the schedule allows you to add an event.
showcase_select_semester: Allows you to select the semester to be displayed
show_guide_desc: You can now follow (again) the presentation guide for the Schedule and Grades pages.
thanks_donation:
This donation makes me extremely happy, although it won't really pay for my lunches, it will allow me to continue this adventure by maintaining the app on the App Store and the Play Store.

Thank you very much,
Antoine Raulin
donate_explain:
If you're feeling extra nice and would like to support LeoPortail's development further, any tip at all helps a ton!
You can also help me by leaving a like on the project's GitHub page or a review in the App Store or Play Store.
Each donation unlocks the additional features of the app and all future ones.
productNotAvailableForPurchaseError: Product not available for purchase. Sorry
theme_locked_donation_msg: This theme is only available after making a donation, regardless of the amount.
